Secret santa present is an untradeable cosmetic holiday item. A Secret santa present can be obtained by completing one of the Christmas holiday events from 2021 onwards.

Initially only the red colour is received, however additional colours can be unlocked by delivering the present to the following NPCs:

  • Bob - South of Lumbridge (Bob's Brilliant Axes) (blue)
  • Aggie - Draynor village (green)
  • Benny - Varrock's fountain square (black)
  • Malignius Mortifer - South of Falador, between Port Sarim and the Crafting guild (gold)

'''Secret santa present''' is an untradeable cosmetic holiday item. A Secret santa present can be obtained by completing one of the [[Christmas event|Christmas]] [[holiday events]] from 2021 onwards. 

Initially only the red colour is received, however additional colours can be unlocked by delivering the present to the following NPCs:
* [[Bob]] - South of Lumbridge (Bob's Brilliant Axes) (blue)
* [[Aggie]] - Draynor village (green)
* [[Benny]] - Varrock's fountain square (black)
* [[Malignius Mortifer]] - South of Falador, between Port Sarim and the Crafting guild (gold)
